CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Gross Margin?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Gross Margin is Inventory Turnover Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Return on Investment (ROI)?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Gross Margin is Member Activity Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Return on Investment (ROI), is the point for Ramirez, Delgado and Lang inside or outside the point for Williams Ltd?
SRP.A: On the Return on Investment (ROI), the point for Ramirez, Delgado and Lang is outside the point for Williams Ltd.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Member Activity Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Williams Ltd?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Member Activity Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Return on Investment (ROI)}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Self-Service Resolution Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Self-Service Resolution Rate, label {Williams Ltd} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Return on Investment (ROI), which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Return on Investment (ROI), label {Williams Ltd} scores the lowest.

NC.Q: For Williams Ltd, which dimension has a higher score: Return on Investment (ROI) or Self-Service Resolution Rate?
NC.A: {Self-Service Resolution Rate} has a higher score than Return on Investment (ROI) for Williams Ltd.

NC.Q: For Williams Ltd, which dimension has a higher score: Inventory Turnover Rate or Traffic Conversion Rate?
NC.A: {Inventory Turnover Rate} has a higher score than Traffic Conversion Rate for Williams Ltd.

NC.Q: On Gross Margin, which label has a higher score: Ramirez, Delgado and Lang or the Williams Ltd?
NC.A: {Williams Ltd} has a higher score on Gross Margin compared to Ramirez, Delgado and Lang.

NC.Q: For Ramirez, Delgado and Lang, which dimension has a higher score: Traffic Conversion Rate or Gross Margin or Return on Investment (ROI)?
NC.A: {Return on Investment (ROI)} has a higher score for Ramirez, Delgado and Lang.

MSR.Q: For Williams Ltd, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Williams Ltd most needs to improve its {Return on Investment (ROI)}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
